Our Projects

Project Tech Stack Description
LIKAY LIKAY is a cross-platform COVID-19 Contact Tracing System developed by LinkedCode. The system aims to aid the local government in tracking possible contacts of Positive Cases.
CBMS++ CBMS++ is a web application that functions as a data managing tool for Community-based Monitoring System information gathered through applications like KoboToolBox.
E-Commerce Website with a Android companion app This web application was built on Ruby on Rails and Android Studio.
